snippet.title: The Tale of Bistun - Official PlayStation Teaser
snippet.description:
Journey into the world of The Tale of Bistun, a story-driven action-adventure inspired by the legendary Persian poem Khosrow and Shirin. In this teaser, get a glimpse of the stunning landscapes, mysterious creatures, and the emotional story that awaits you.

Release Date: January 21st 2025
